## Story

I have grown knowing that you go to university to get a paper and then
"at the job" you'll be taught how to work. This view is prevalent among
Ukrainians, who are on paper the most educated population in Europe

:::: {.cr-section layout="overlay-center"}
::: {#cr-timeline}

::: {.cell .column-screen}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](img/story.png)
:::
:::

:::

@cr-timeline

@cr-timeline

@cr-timeline

@cr-timeline

We have missed two years of student life due to covid, which could be
the reason we have bonded this much. @cr-timeline

From the very first days there was a difference. Students actually
wanted to study. @cr-timeline

So much so that we studied despite the power outages. We'd sit in the
school's basement. This would be fixed @cr-timeline

And study on campus sometimes deep into the night. @cr-timeline

By the end of the first semester I was happy to have survived. I have
failed one class and had to retake it next year. @cr-timeline

January marked the start of the hardest period thus far with more
advanced courses. Whereas before I saw studying as a good thing to do.
Now I saw that I can actually achieve smth. @cr-timeline

This intensity took it's toll as taking a nap a frequent occurrence. I
wasn't the only one affected. @cr-timeline

There was no time to sleep, as our university had many guests come visit
and talk to students. Sanna Marin, Ulf Kristensson, Mark Rutte
@cr-timeline

I started looking for an internship as early as April. We had more
studies in May-June. @cr-timeline

The ultimate test of one's knowledge is getting a job. For me it came
naturally, many of my peers and many more in other universities have to
work in addition to studying. Stipend if you manage to get one is so
meager, you can't live off of it. @cr-timeline

I got a job as a junior researcher at Institute for Behavioral Studies.
I would be working with prof. that initially sparked my interest in
behavioral economics! @cr-timeline

Life as it is right now is very uncertain and one out to be prepared. In
2022 I have attended millitary training courses at my hometown, now,
having more time I took an intensive military course. @cr-timeline

While we are on the topic. It's true that for many men getting a degree
became a chance to buy time (student's are exempt from draft).
@cr-timeline

I took writing thesis seriously and have read extensively. @cr-timeline

Added pressure was from having to retake calculus from last year.
@cr-timeline

All this yellow in the middle! Somebody was hurrying to finish by
November 1st! @cr-timeline

And I did! @cr-timeline

Last step was thesis defence after which I became master @cr-timeline
